markdown.markdown:
:::{.columns} ::: {.column width="35%"} Welcome to **KejaConnect** — your all-in-one platform for discovering real estate opportunities and trusted local service providers near you. Whether you're buying land, renting a home, or managing a property, our interactive maps and smart tables help you find what you need — from available plots to nearby plumbers, electricians, and more. With KejaConnect, you're not just moving in — you're plugging in. ::: ::: {.column width="65%"} ```{r echo=FALSE} #| echo: false #| message: false #| warning: false library(leaflet) library(leaflet.extras) library(dplyr) library(sf) library(scales) # Define possible statuses statuses <- c("For Sale", "For Rent", "For Lease") parcels <- st_read("parcels.shp", quiet = TRUE) %>% st_make_valid() %>% st_transform(crs = 4326) # Add and populate columns set.seed(123) # For reproducibility parcels <- parcels %>% mutate( status = sample(statuses, size = n(), replace = TRUE), price = case_when( status == "For Sale" ~ sample(seq(1e6, 50e6, by = 1e6), size = n(), replace = TRUE), status == "For Rent" ~ sample(seq(10000, 150000, by = 5000), size = n(), replace = TRUE), status == "For Lease" ~ sample(seq(50000, 5e6, by = 50000), size = n(), replace = TRUE) ) ) kejaz <- st_read("D:\\Rstuff\\Distill\\whuo\\whuo\\kejaz.shp", quiet = TRUE) set.seed(123) # For reproducibility # Define the real typologies to sample from real_typologies <- c("Bungalow", "Studio", "Flat", "Duplex", "Townhouse", "Cottage", "Penthouse", "Villa") # Identify rows with bedroom-based labels bedroom_rows <- kejaz$HsTyplg %in% c("1 Bedroom", "2 Bedroom", "3 Bedroom") # Randomly assign new typologies to those rows kejaz$HsTyplg[bedroom_rows] <- sample(real_typologies, sum(bedroom_rows), replace = TRUE) image_urls <- c( "https://marbleengineering.co.ke/wp-content/uploads/2024/12/maisonette-with-attic-1.jpg", # Maisonette "https://www.themoonapartments.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/06/Furnished-Apartment-Building-The-Moon-Serenity-Furnished-Apartments-Lymack-Suites-Fourways-Junction-Estate-Northern-Bypass-Road.webp", # Apartment "https://diamondcityvillas.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/IMG_7004.jpeg", # Bedsitter "https://shiftersmovers.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/03/Expensive-Estates-In-Nairobi-1_02f6018e0_4720.jpg", # Mansion "https://i0.wp.com/www.kenyaconstructionworks.co.ke/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/home-house-construction.jpg?resize=640%2C480&ssl=1", # Bungalow "https://cf.bstatic.com/xdata/images/hotel/max1024x768/490723700.jpg?k=2d2b6d85bf110f67e8581af50156556d71c6e0df47e9f4f0394bcc30da6405e4&o=&hp=1", # Studio "https://propscout.co.ke/storage/properties/files/block-of-flat-for-sale-in-kasarani-awbw8.jpeg", # Flat "https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcS6lJQcWb0ZQ1VHdd4RYNIUUHUBnVRPEVuHCw&s", # Duplex "https://propscout.co.ke/storage/properties/files/1233/thumbnails/uwjuj-4-bedroom-townhouse-for-sale-in-westlands.jpg", # Townhouse "https://a0.muscache.com/im/pictures/miso/Hosting-46759784/original/cd161fea-6798-4489-9ca8-c5a3b9b6b958.jpeg", # Cottage "https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcRjkxe5G5wd6p4oOmdvHg-g9C7SjxR5CyBTJA&s", # Villa "https://88nairobi.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/88-Nairobi-Lordship-PenthouseArtboard-3-1024x577.jpg" # Penthouse ) house_types <- c( "Maisonette", "Apartment", "Bedsitter", "Mansion", "Bungalow", "Studio", "Flat", "Duplex", "Townhouse", "Cottage", "Villa", "Penthouse" ) # Named vector for image mapping url_map <- setNames(image_urls, house_types) # Assign image URL to each row kejaz <- kejaz %>% mutate(Image_URL = url_map[HsTyplg]) typology_icons <- c( "Maisonette" = "home", "Apartment" = "building", "Bedsitter" = "bed", "Mansion" = "home", "Bungalow" = "home", "Studio" = "cube", "Flat" = "building", "Duplex" = "columns", "Townhouse" = "warehouse", "Cottage" = "tree", "Villa" = "spa", "Penthouse" = "star" ) typology_colors <- c( "Maisonette" = "red", "Apartment" = "blue", "Bedsitter" = "lightred", "Mansion" = "darkred", "Bungalow" = "orange", "Studio" = "purple", "Flat" = "cadetblue", "Duplex" = "darkblue", "Townhouse" = "green", "Cottage" = "beige", "Villa" = "darkgreen", "Penthouse" = "black" ) # Add icon and color columns kejaz$icon_name <- typology_icons[kejaz$HsTyplg] kejaz$marker_color <- typology_colors[kejaz$HsTyplg] icons <- awesomeIcons( icon = kejaz$icon_name, library = "ion", markerColor = kejaz$marker_color, iconColor = "white" ) # Define colors for parcel statuses status_colors <- c("For Sale" = "green", "For Rent" = "blue", "For Lease" = "orange") pal_status <- colorFactor(status_colors, parcels$status) # Define colors for house typology typology_palette <- colorFactor("Set2", kejaz$HsTyplg) leaflet() %>% # Add base layers addProviderTiles(providers$CartoDB.Positron, group = "CartoDB") %>% addProviderTiles(providers$Esri.WorldImagery, group = "Satellite") %>% addProviderTiles(providers$OpenStreetMap, group = "OSM") %>% # Add polygons with color by status addPolygons( data = parcels, fillColor = ~pal_status(status), color = "black", weight = 15, fillOpacity = 0.6, label = ~paste("Status:", status, "
Price:", format(price, big.mark = ",")), group = "Parcels by Status" ) %>% addAwesomeMarkers( data = kejaz, icon = icons, label = paste0(kejaz$HsTyplg, " in ", kejaz$Nghbrhd), popup = ~paste0( "House Typology: ", kejaz$HsTyplg, "
House Availabe For: ", kejaz$For, "
No. of Bedrooms: ", kejaz$N_ofBdr, "
Rent or Price: ", paste0("Kshs ", comma(as.numeric(kejaz$Prc.Rnt)), "/-"), "
Available Amenities: ", kejaz$AdddAmn, "
", "
View More Details" ), group = "Houses by Typology" ) %>% # Add markers with color by house typology # addCircleMarkers( # data = kejaz, # color = ~typology_palette(kejaz$HsTyplg), # radius = 6, # stroke = FALSE, # fillOpacity = 0.8, # label = ~paste("Typology:", kejaz$HsTyplg), # popup = ~paste0( # "House Typology: ", kejaz$HsTyplg, # "
House Availabe For: ", kejaz$For, # "
No. of Bedrooms: ", kejaz$N_ofBdr, # "
Rent or Price: ", paste0("Kshs ", comma(as.numeric(kejaz$Prc.Rnt)), "/-"), # "
Available Amenities: ", kejaz$AdddAmn, # "
", # "
View More Details" # ), # group = "Houses by Typology" # ) %>% # Add layer control addLayersControl( baseGroups = c("CartoDB", "Satellite", "OSM"), overlayGroups = c("Parcels by Status", "Houses by Typology"), options = layersControlOptions(collapsed = FALSE) ) %>% # Add legends addLegend( position = "bottomleft", pal = pal_status, values = parcels$status, title = "Parcel Status" ) %>% addLegend( position = "bottomright", pal = typology_palette, values = kejaz$HsTyplg, title = "House Typology" ) %>% # Fullscreen button addFullscreenControl() ``` :::
markdown.srcMarkdownNoYaml:
:::{.columns} ::: {.column width="35%"} ### *Find Your Space. Settle with Ease* Welcome to **KejaConnect** — your all-in-one platform for discovering real estate opportunities and trusted local service providers near you. Whether you're buying land, renting a home, or managing a property, our interactive maps and smart tables help you find what you need — from available plots to nearby plumbers, electricians, and more. With KejaConnect, you're not just moving in — you're plugging in. ::: ::: {.column width="65%"} ```{r echo=FALSE} #| echo: false #| message: false #| warning: false library(leaflet) library(leaflet.extras) library(dplyr) library(sf) library(scales) # Duplex "https://propscout.co.ke/storage/properties/files/1233/thumbnails/uwjuj-4-bedroom-townhouse-for-sale-in-westlands.jpg", # Townhouse "https://a0.muscache.com/im/pictures/miso/Hosting-46759784/original/cd161fea-6798-4489-9ca8-c5a3b9b6b958.jpeg", # Cottage "https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcRjkxe5G5wd6p4oOmdvHg-g9C7SjxR5CyBTJA&s", # Villa "https://88nairobi.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/88-Nairobi-Lordship-PenthouseArtboard-3-1024x577.jpg" # Penthouse ) house_types <- c( "Maisonette", "Apartment", "Bedsitter", "Mansion", "Bungalow", "Studio", "Flat", "Duplex", "Townhouse", "Cottage", "Villa", "Penthouse" ) # Named vector for image mapping url_map <- setNames(image_urls, house_types) # No. of Bedrooms: ", kejaz$N_ofBdr, "
Rent or Price: ", paste0("Kshs ", comma(as.numeric(kejaz$Prc.Rnt)), "/-"), "

", "
View More Details" ), group = "Houses by Typology" ) %>% # Add markers with color by house typology # addCircleMarkers( # data = kejaz, # color = ~typology_palette(kejaz$HsTyplg), # radius = 6, # stroke = FALSE, # fillOpacity = 0.8, # label = ~paste("Typology:", kejaz$HsTyplg), # popup = ~paste0( # "House Typology: ", kejaz$HsTyplg, # "
